String.string: Plague Hunt
"I understand."
"I'll keep an eye out."
Go to Amallen at Camp Retribution and ask what he needs.
You see farming tool crates scattered around.
Go to Ordnarath and retrieve the document.
Seach the crates for the document.
Ordnarath Report
Find Bedoram at Camp Redemption and deliver the document.
"I'll do whatever I can."
Teleport to the wagon through {@linkcreature:215#1027$$Bedoram} and protect it.
Protect the wagon. [Approach the wagon and select "Protect the Supply Carriage" to advance this quest.]
"I can help."
Use {@LinkCreature:439#1004#Exit Teleportal} to return to Camp Redemption and speak with Bedoram.
Take blood samples from the local blood fiends.
Rush the blood samples to Bedoram at Camp Redemption.
"Glad to help."
"Right. Okay."
"Happy to do my part."
"How did the analysis go?"
